We are sorry but the fax you attempted to send to ${FAXDESTNUM} failed to send after multiple attempts. Please reach out to the person you are trying to send a fax to in order to verify they are able to receive faxes from you.

If you have any questions, feel free to email our customer success team ( support@voxo.co ). (We're lightning quick at replying.) We also offer live chat on our website.

Thanks,
From the VOXO Team
